title: Fields: Cocktail Info - Library

sub_fields.label: Instruction Group
sub_fields.name: instruction_group
sub_fields.instructions: This is treated like a column; if you only need one column for this recipe then use only one instruction group. If you want to re-order groups, please drag-and-drop using the left-most numbered column.

fields.label: Tab Order
fields.instructions: Please add the tab order number. Example: Parts -> 3, ML -> 1, CL -> 2 will have the tabs displayed as ML - CL - Parts.

description: Library version - Do not modify in this project as any changes will be overwritten by future updates.
